name: Fast Taxi Drive 3d
description: Fast Taxi Drive 3D is a game in which you will drive Taxi on City Street to pick and drop passengers at the given perfect target on the destinations. This game will open your world to one of the most amazing game and you will have best road taxi riding experience. Drive your taxi on city roads with full speed on reaching time you can also test your thrill driving skills and face difficult trails with stunning Graphics and realistic environment where you will drive yellow taxi like physical driver and make remarkable internal emotion like a real time taxi driver. So are you going to play and ride new amazing and adventurous Taxi in Fast Taxi Drive 3D game?
